categories.name: Tool Capabilities
categories.description: Explore App Connect Enterprise concepts by following simple tutorials

tutorials.name: Getting started with ACEv11 - Creating an Integration Server
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn some basics about integration servers and how to use them (recommended v11.0.0.1 or higher)

tutorials.name: Getting started with ACEv11 - Exploring the Web UI
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn some basics about administering ACE using a Web UI (recommended v11.0.0.1 or higher)

tutorials.name: Getting started with ACEv11 - Exploring the Admin REST API
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn some basics about administering ACE using its administrative REST API (recommended v11.0.0.1 or higher)

tutorials.name: Getting started with ACEv11 - Policy Projects and Policies
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn about configuring ACE behavior using Policies (recommended v11.0.0.1 or higher)

tutorials.name: Getting started with ACEv11 - Policy Projects and Policies with Overrides
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn about configuring ACE behavior using Policies and the hierarchy of policy overrides (recommended v11.0.0.1 or higher)

tutorials.name: Getting started with ACEv11 - Message Flow Statistics
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to view ACE performance information using Message Flow Statistics (recommended v11.0.0.1 or higher)

tutorials.name: Getting started with ACEv11 - Resource Statistics
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to view ACE performance information using Resource Statistics (recommended v11.0.0.1 or higher)

tutorials.name: Using a REST API to manage a set of records
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a REST API with a simple example managing a set of records.

tutorials.name: Using a HTTP Input to drive a message flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use HTTPInput and HTTPReply nodes to expose an http URL that can drive a message flow.

tutorials.name: Using a Mapping node to access a Lookup table that is stored in the Global Cache
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a Mapping node to graphically access a Lookup table stored in the Global Cache (requires IBM App Connect Enterprise v11 fixpack 4 or later).

tutorials.name: Using a JavaCompute node to split up a large input file
tutorials.shortDesc: Split a large input message into individual records, using Java transformation code, in a memory-efficient manner.

tutorials.name: Using a ResetContentDescriptor node to associate a new parser with a message in a flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the ResetContentDescriptor node to associate a new parser with a message, shown in this example of reacting to a parser exception on input to a flow.

tutorials.name: Using a FlowOrder node to control the order of execution paths in a flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the FlowOrder node to control the order of execution paths in a message flow driven by a JSON message over HTTP.

tutorials.name: Using a Validate node to check a message against an XML schema
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the Validate node to check a message against an XML schema in a message flow driven by an XML message over HTTP.

tutorials.name: Using a WorkLoad Management Policy to restrict the maximum throughput of a flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a Workload Management Policy to restrict the maximum rate at which a message flow can run.

tutorials.name: Using a LoopBack Request node to insert data into a Cloudant database
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the LoopBackRequest node to create a JSON document in a Cloudant database.

tutorials.name: Using a SalesforceRequest node to retrieve records from Salesforce.com
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the SalesforceRequest node to retrieve records from Salesforce.com

tutorials.name: Using a Sequence node to inject a sequence number into a message
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the Sequence node to inject sequence numbers into message data as it goes through a message flow.

tutorials.name: Using a Resequence node to reorder messages going through a flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the Resequence node to control the sequence in which a group of incoming messages are propagated through the message flow.

tutorials.name: Using the KafkaProducer and KafkaConsumer nodes with a Kafka topic
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a KafkaProducer and KafkaConsumer node to produce and consume messages using a Kafka topic.

tutorials.name: Using the MQTTSubscribe node to receive MQTT messages from MQTT topics
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the MQTTSubscribe node to receive messages from an MQTT server.

tutorials.name: Using the TCP/IP nodes to integrate with TCP/IP sockets
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use TCP/IP nodes for integration with external applications using TCPIP sockets.

tutorials.name: Using Callable Flows to split synchronous flow processing
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to split synchronous flow processing using CallableFlow nodes.

tutorials.name: Call a REST API using the RESTRequest node
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a RESTRequest node to call a REST API

tutorials.name: Call a REST API using the RESTAsyncRequest node
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a RESTAsyncRequest node to call a REST API and a RESTAsyncResponse node to receive the response

tutorials.name: Aggregation nodes using MQ nodes with back-end services
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the Aggregation nodes to fan-out and fan-in messages using MQ nodes.

tutorials.name: Aggregation nodes using HTTPAsyncRequest nodes with back-end services
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the Aggregation nodes to fan-out and fan-in messages using asynchronous HTTP nodes.

tutorials.name: Aggregation nodes using RESTAsyncRequest nodes with back-end services
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the Aggregation nodes to fan-out and fan-in messages using asynchronous REST nodes.

tutorials.name: Aggregation nodes using SOAPAsyncRequest nodes with back-end services
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the Aggregation nodes to fan-out and fan-in messages using asynchronous SOAP nodes.

tutorials.name: Aggregation nodes using CallableFlowAsyncInvoke nodes with back-end services
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the Aggregation nodes to fan-out and fan-in messages using asynchronous Callable Flow nodes.

tutorials.name: Transformation using a Map in a message flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a Mapping node to transform data.

tutorials.name: Transformation using ESQL in a message flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a Compute node to transform data using ESQL.

tutorials.name: Transformation using Java in a message flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a JavaCompute node to transform data using Java.

tutorials.name: Transformation using Java (JAXB) in a message flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a JavaCompute node to transform data using Java (JAXB).

tutorials.name: Transformation using XSL in a message flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use an XSL Transform node to transform data using XSL.

tutorials.name: Transformation using .NET in a message flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a .NETCompute node to transform data using C#. (Windows platforms only)

tutorials.name: Routing - Using a Route node to route data in a message flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the Route node to route messages in a message flow driven by a JSON message over HTTP.

tutorials.name: Routing - Using a RouteToLabel node to route data in a message flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the RouteToLabel node to route messages in a message flow driven by a JSON message over HTTP.

tutorials.name: Routing - Using a Filter node to route data in a message flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the Filter node to route messages in a message flow driven by a JSON message over HTTP.

tutorials.name: Routing - Using a Compute node to route data in a message flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the Compute node to route messages in a message flow driven by a JSON message over HTTP.

tutorials.name: Routing - Using a JavaCompute node to route data in a message flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the JavaCompute node to route messages in a message flow driven by a JSON message over HTTP.

tutorials.name: Databases - Using a DatabaseRetrieve node to retrieve data from DB2 via JDBC
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the DatabaseRetrieve node to retrieve data from DB2 using a message flow driven by a JSON message over HTTP.

tutorials.name: Databases - Using a DatabaseRoute node to route messages based on data from DB2 via JDBC
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the DatabaseRoute node to route messages based on data from DB2 using a message flow driven by a JSON message over HTTP.

tutorials.name: Databases - Using a Mapping node to insert data into a DB2 database via JDBC
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the Mapping node to insert data into DB2 using a message flow driven by a JSON message over HTTP.

tutorials.name: Databases - Using a JavaCompute node to insert data into a DB2 database via JDBC
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the JavaCompute node to insert data into DB2 using a message flow driven by a JSON message over HTTP.

tutorials.name: Databases - Using a Compute node to insert data into a DB2 database via ODBC
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use Compute node ESQL to insert data into DB2 using a message flow driven by a JSON message over HTTP.

tutorials.name: Databases - Using a Database node to insert data into a DB2 database via ODBC
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use Database node ESQL to insert data into DB2 using a message flow driven by a JSON message over HTTP.

tutorials.name: Databases - Using a DatabaseInput node to trigger a flow on insert into DB2 via ODBC
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a DatabaseInput node to trigger a flow when data is inserted into DB2.

tutorials.name: Integration services (SOAP/HTTP inputs)
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn about integration services that use SOAP/HTTP inputs.

tutorials.name: Modeling CSV data by using DFDL
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to model CSV data using Data Format Description Language (DFDL).

tutorials.name: Modeling COBOL data by using DFDL
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to model COBOL data by using Data Format Description Language (DFDL).

tutorials.name: Modeling EDIFACT data by using DFDL
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to model EDIFACT data by using Data Format Description Language (DFDL).

tutorials.name: Modeling HL7 data by using DFDL
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to model HL7 healthcare data using Data Format Description Language (DFDL).

tutorials.name: Modeling Toshiba 4690 TLog data by using DFDL
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to model Toshiba 4690 Point of Sale Transaction Log data by using Data Format Description Language (DFDL).

tutorials.name: Modeling ISO 8583 data by using DFDL
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to model ISO 8583 data by using Data Format Description Language (DFDL).

categories.name: Scenarios
categories.description: Explore powerful App Connect Enterprise capabilities through integrated scenarios
